message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. Could you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $1250000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $1100000?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $1200000? It's the best I can do
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $1150000?
